name: Mau Cryst

ability.name: Gold Digger
ability.description: Sometimes digs up Gold Coin when assigned to Ranch.

description: Its crystalline tail is beautiful, but shatters when this Pal dies. Some believe it is good luck to raise one, so Mau Cryst in captivity are treated with great care.

skills.name: Ice Missile
skills.description: Creates ice lances in the air that fly towards enemies.

skills.name: Air Cannon
skills.description: Quickly fires a burst of highly pressurized air.

skills.name: Sand Blast
skills.description: Hurls sticky mud at an enemy.

skills.name: Icicle Cutter
skills.description: Creates a crescent blade of ice and hurls it forward.

skills.name: Iceberg
skills.description: Summons a sharp ice lance under an enemy.

skills.name: Cryst Breath
skills.description: Enshrouds an enemy in a frigid blast of air, dealing continuous damage.

skills.name: Blizzard Spike
skills.description: Creates a giant lump of ice and hurls it at an enemy. It deals damage to those in the surrounding area upon impact.
